long_description: Easy-to-use, fluorinated Swix F4 Universal paste wax works for all snow conditions, from very wet to very cold. Just apply and go! Sponge onto your skis or snowboard then follow up with brush for smooth gliding, easy turning and enhanced control. Also prevents the base from drying out through oxidation. Includes applicator pad; nylon brush sold separately.
short_description: Easy-to-use, fluorinated Swix F4 Universal paste wax works for all snow conditions, from very wet to very cold. Just apply and go!
